welcome.description1: Hello, my name is Moussa, I am 24 years old and I live in Paris. I am currently working at CANAL+ in the Front TV team as a Front-end Developer.
welcome.description2: In my free time, I design web and mobile applications. I mainly work around the JavaScript ecosystem and make most of my applications in TypeScript.

canalplus.title: Front-End Developer at CANAL+
canalplus.description: Continuous improvement of the CANAL+ player. Progressive transition of the codebase from JavaScript to TypeScript. Unit, integration and end-to-end testing.
canalplus.stack: Stack: React, JavaScript, TypeScript, Redux, Jest, testing-library, Lerna, Nightwatch.

tictactrip.title: Front-End Developer at Tictactrip
tictactrip.description: Creation of static and dynamic pages. Improvement of the graphical interfaces of the site. Implementation of user tests. Debugging and optimization of existing JavaScript modules.
tictactrip.stack: Stack: React, JavaScript, Redux, Styled-Component, Jest, Enzyme.

seaclick.title: Full-Stack Developer at Seaclick (now Leisly)
seaclick.description: Optimization of the user experience (UX). Creation of design components (UI). Development of automation scripts and study of indexing robots.
seaclick.stack: Stack: Vue, Laravel, JavaScript, PHP7, SCSS, Blade.
